article_title: Endorsement: Dave Jones best choice for insurance commissioner
article_text: Proposition 103 has been the law in California for a generation. The person who occupies the office of insurance commissioner should be a believer in the office and in the law that created it. In this election, Dave Jones is that candidate.

article_metadata.title: Endorsement: Dave Jones best choice for insurance commissioner | The Sacramento Bee
